attributes.action: review and promote a national campaign to increase the amount of males undertaking early years childcare courses and ensure equal pay is given to the early years childcare workforce. To undertake research in the existing amount of males working with children 0-5 by sending questionnaires to all private and state run 0-5 setting across the United Kingdom. To get a true picture of Britains early years male workforce.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Research the amount of males in Early childcare settings and establish a national 0-5 campign to encourage men to work in the 0-5 age range
